channel.title: Help with Hamchi please
channel.description:
I have Hamachi, everythings done but how do you make a RuneScape server on it..? I made a server but its just comes up as a chat thing, really annoying :S
Thanks, no rude comments please

item.title: Help with Hamchi please
item.dc:creator: @I_Kill_Who I Kill Who
item.description:
@I_Kill_Who wrote:

Dont spam you noob, I read that[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 10:03:56 PM[/size][hr]bump, Lol so much for him spamming[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 11:58:14 PM[/size][hr]Bump…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Hamchi please
item.dc:creator: @wild wild
item.description:
@wild wrote:

Once you have your server made and ready to go, and Hamachi is fully installed, open up Hamachi. Then, at the bottom, click the button with a “Triangle” shape. Then choose Start Network (Not sure of exact wording). Once you are that far, put in the desired network name and desired password. You can make more than one network.

For example, I have 10 Networks for my server:
FateScape1
FateScape2
FateScape3
and so on up to FateScape10.

Once you have that taken care of, just give people the IP number at the top of your Hamachi Client.

If you have more questions/problems, I will be glad to help

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Hamchi please
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

what you need to do, is make a hamachi group, tell people the name and pass for the group, then they can logg in using your ip for hamachi which is (for me) 5.59.155.80
